newsitem.title: CROATIA: Croatian stocks close mixed to higher.
newsitem.headline: Croatian stocks close mixed to higher.

text.p: Croatian shares closed mixed to higher in livelier trade on Friday.
* Of 15 active shares eight were up, four down and three remained flat.
* The turnover was up at 16.8 million, while volume remained at the same level with 11,931 shares traded.
* Biggest gainer hotelier Riviera gained 19 kuna to 169, trading 210 shares.
* Biggest loser, Trgovacka Banka, lost 150 kuna to close at 1,100, selling only 20 shares.
* Most active issue was Zagreback Banka, which fell 10 kuna to 1,990, trading 7,098 shares. -- Zagreb Newsroom, 385-1-4557075
